value.title: AI Tracks Lawmakers Using Their Phones on the Job so We Can Properly Mock Them
value.excerpt: Politicians are hereby busted for using their cell phones during sessions, thanks to software written by Belgium artist Dries Depoorter. His artificial intelligence program “The Flemish Scrollers” reviews YouTube live streams of Flemish government meetings and identifies who’s on their phone along with their face and Twitter handle.
